entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , Donnacona
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:52 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -9.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Deschambault 2:00 PM EST Friday 17 February 2023
Temperature: -9.8°C
Humidity: 80 %
Wind Chill: -16
Dewpoint: -12.6°C
Wind: NNW 14 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 8.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy ending late this afternoon then cloudy. Blowing snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 except 80 near the river early this afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill minus 19 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023
